name: Amethyst
body:
### amethyst (soon to be renamed)

A programming language with both minimalism and utility in mind. It is inspired by TI-Basic.

### Example?

```
$fib = λ
  l = 0
  u = 1
  For i, 2, #1
    t = u
    u += l
    l = t
  EndFor
  u
Endλ
```

### Version 0.5.x

Later versions may contain functions missing in earlier versions. The latest is **0.5.9**.

### Roadmap to 0.6

[x] bitwise operators
[x] math functions
[x] time functions
[ ] collection functions
[ ] random functions
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
